string-array.name: well_being_desc
string-array.item: Meditation helps relief from stress and anxiety, decreased blood pressure, lower cholesterol levels, and more
Through exercises & spiritual movement, you\'d reach very high realms, enlightening to the true meanings of life, and finding the path of return to your origins
Listen to best selling audio books from spiritual leader Eckhart Tolle
